byline.original: By IAN LOVETT and ADAM NAGOURNEY

snippet: The actresses Scarlett Johansson and Mila Kunis were among the victims of a hacker who stole personal information from celebrities, an F.B.I. source said.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Wiretapping and Other Eavesdropping Devices and Methods

lead_paragraph: The actresses Scarlett Johansson and Mila Kunis were among the victims of a hacker who stole personal information from celebrities, an F.B.I. source said.

headline.main: Arrest Is Made in Hacking of Celebrities’ Private E-Mail
headline.print_headline: Arrest Is Made in Hacking Of Celebrities’ Private E-Mail
headline.seo: Arrest Is Made in Celebrity E-Mail Hacking
